price: E Noé disse: "Senhor meu! Não deixes, sobre a terra, nenhum dos renegadores da Fé."
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
